reviews.text:
Decent coffee, with slightly lower than typical prices. I personally had the strawberry matcha, which didn't quite do it for me - a strange mix that didn't end up with either tasting strongly nor each complementing the other. I believe the standard and safer orders would do better.

The wait time was significant on a Saturday afternoon, likely due to the many patrons at the post-lunch hour. Might take 15-25 minutes for the drinks to be served.

Koffee Kollective has been such a joy to have in this neighbourhood! Their drinks are remarkably good and the pricing is so affordable! The team is always friendly every time I visit! I‚Äôve tried multiple drinks and they have been great every time!

Would personally the Spanish latte if you‚Äôre looking for something rich, sweet & creamy! It‚Äôs the best Spanish latte I‚Äôve had in a long time!

recently discovered this coffeeshop near my place! their drinks are of great quality and for an affordable price! i really like their iced latte (4.30) /honey oat latte/toffee nut latte (4.70) also the staff are so friendly even when its rush hour for them would highly recommend ü´°üëçüèº

Visited this cozy coffee nook ran by Joshua, Amanda, and of course, my favourite‚Ä¶ JX. Good coffee, good vibes, serves the community, always busy but never too long a wait. Can use CDC voucher too for those of you coupon clippers. Get your coffee fix then pop by opposite for good cheap hawker food. Amazing place and wish there were more outlets like this in the heartlands!

This was my second time getting the strawberry matcha, and it's my favorite! It has the perfect balance of creaminess. The white chocolate latte was just as great‚Äîsmooth and not too sweet. Highly recommend both! Plus, the staff are super friendly! üòá
